required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Baricitinib (LY3009104) in Participants With Rheumatoid Arthritis
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Active-Controlled, Parallel-Group, Phase 3b/4 Study of Baricitinib in Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis

brief_summary.textblock: This post-marketing study is designed to compare the safety of baricitinib versus tumor necrosis factor (TNF) inhibitors with respect to venous thromboembolic events (VTEs) when given to participants with rheumatoid arthritis.

primary_outcome.measure: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First Event of Venous Thromboembolism (VTE)
primary_outcome.description: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First Event of VTE

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First Arterial Thromboembolic Event (ATE)
secondary_outcome.description: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First ATE

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First Major Adverse Cerebro-Cardiovascular Event (MACE)
secondary_outcome.description: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First MACE

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First Malignancy (excluding nonmelanoma skin cancer [NMSC])
secondary_outcome.description: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First Malignancy (excluding NMSC)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First Opportunistic Infection
secondary_outcome.description: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First Opportunistic Infection

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First Serious Infection
secondary_outcome.description: Time from First Dose of Study Treatment to First Serious Infection

arm_group.description: Adalimumab or etanercept administered subcutaneously (SC) per standard of care.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants must have at least one of the following characteristics:
- Documented evidence of a VTE prior to this study
- At least 60 years of age
- A body mass index (BMI) greater than or equal to 30 kilograms per meter squared (kg/m²), or
- Age 50 to less than 60 years and BMI 25 to less than 30 kg/m².
- Participants must have an inadequate response or intolerance to at least 1 disease-modifying antirheumatic drugs (DMARD) (synthetic or biologic).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participant should have no reason to not take a TNF inhibitor.
- Participants must not be pregnant or breastfeeding.
- Participants must not have had more than one VTE.
- Participants must not have cancer.
- Participants must not have active herpes zoster, serious infection, active tuberculosis, or any other serious illness.
- Participants must not have had a live vaccine within four weeks of study start.
- Participants must not have participated in any other clinical trial within four weeks of study start.
- Participants must not have a history of IV drug use, other illicit drug abuse, or chronic alcohol abuse in the past year.

link.description: A Study of Baricitinib (LY3009104) in Participants With Rheumatoid Arthritis

patient_data.ipd_description: Anonymized individual patient level data will be provided in a secure access environment upon approval of a research proposal and a signed data sharing agreement.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data are available 6 months after the primary publication and approval of the indication studied in the US and EU, whichever is later. Data will be indefinitely available for requesting.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: A research proposal must be approved by an independent review panel and researchers must sign a data sharing agreement.
